page.title: 10BULCOTE-SURVEY-TRANSPORT
page.content: Bulcote is a small village which is attached to the North East tip of Burton Joyce.Although it consists of only approximately 70 houses,it has its own identity and village activities. We conducted a survey and half the residents (approx) took part. A lot of people have lived in Bulcote for more than 5yrs.Ten families have lived in Bulcote less than this.Most people go into Nottingham in cars, eleven families get into town by bus. Two people move around on motorbikes.Twelve people get to work in cars and one goes to work on a bus. No-one goes to work on the train. Many people thought the public transport system through Bulcote was inadequate.
